PerfectNetExp.abs: ...婆罗门参编辑婆罗门参(salsify)，别名西洋牛蒡，为菊科婆罗门参属，能形成肥大肉质根的二年生草本植物，肉质根可煮食或切成小片煎食，嫩叶也可生食，原产欧洲南部的希腊，意大利等地，有200多.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French salsifis, from obsolete Italian salsefica, of unknown ultimate origin

means.word_mean: 1. edible root of the salsify plant
2. Mediterranean biennial herb with long-stemmed heads of purple ray flowers and milky sap and long edible root; naturalized throughout United States
3. either of two long roots eaten cooked
